content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

###Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

###Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5) with chest at (5.5, 3.5)

###Production Line at (2, 7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7)
- Multiple burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), and (3.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)

###Copper Cable Assembly Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for input/output
- Connected wooden chests at (11.5, 14.5) and (17.5, 14.5)

###Electronic Circuit Assembly Line at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material handling
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)

###Power Generation Setup (In Progress)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting these components

###Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt networks at (5.5, 8.5) to (14.5, 4.5)
- Belt systems connecting smelting arrays to assembly machines
- Various interconnected belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid components (pumps, boilers, steam engines)
- Verify that pipe segments are properly aligned and connected
- Check that fluid systems are complete without gaps

### Errors with entity placement
- Verify there is enough space for entity placement
- Check entity orientation and connection points match
- Ensure ground is suitable for placement

### Power system errors
- Connect all electrical components to power network
- Ensure steam engine has proper fluid input
- Verify boiler has fuel and water supply

### Production line errors
- Ensure assembling machines have required resources
- Verify inserters are properly oriented for input/output
- Check that belt systems properly feed materials to machines
